original_text: Therefore the place was named Kibroth Hattaavah, because there they buried the people who had craved other food.
korean_text: 그 곳 이름을 기브롯 핫다아와라 불렀으니 욕심을 낸 백성을 거기 장사함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the place was named Kibroth Hattaavah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그 곳은 키브롯핫다아라고 불리게 되었고

sentences.original_text: because there they buried the people
